QuestData.Title: What? This Old Thing?
QuestData.Description: A deal's a deal.$b$bI present you - mysterious $r stranger - with the one and only Pewter Pounder.$b$bYou may approach and receive this illustrious gift.$b$bThere, now, while it may look to be a simple hammer to the untrained eye, there are surely many hidden properties that will only manifest themselves when the appropriate situation arises.$b$bTake good care of this treasure, stranger. It has been in my royal possession for... well... days, now!
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring The Pewter Pounder to Harrison at The Accursed Reef.
